required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Association Between Sexual Dysfunction in Adults and Behavioral Dysfunctions in Achieving Proper Dental Care

brief_summary.textblock:
Evaluation of sexual functioning of patients at the Sexual Medical Center, at Sheba Medical Center in Israel. Sexual functioning shall be compared with their dental behavior.
Hypothesis: a positive association will be found.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients, male and female, age over 18, who apply to the Sexual Medical Center, at Sheba Medical Center will fill a battery of questionnaires regarding their sexual function and dental treatment.

study_pop.textblock: Men and women, over 18 years old, who come for sexual therapy/ counseling to the Sexual Medical Center, in Sheba Medical Center, Israel Partners or spouses of the above.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men and women, over 18 years old, who come for sexual therapy/ counseling to the Sexual Medical Center, in Sheba Medical Center, Israel Partners or spouses of the above.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are already in the middle of treatment.

overall_official.affiliation: Dept. of Obstetricts and Gynecology, Sheba Medical Center, Israel
